org.grobid.core.document

Class Document

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grobid.core.document.Document
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PatentDocument

    public class Document
extends Object
    Class for representing, processing and exchanging a document item.
    Author:
    Patrice Lopez

      • reconnectBlocks

        public void reconnectBlocks()
                     throws Exception
        Try to reconnect blocks cut because of layout constraints (new col., new page, inserted figure, etc.) -> not used anymore
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getHeaderFeatured

        public String getHeaderFeatured(boolean getHeader,
                       boolean withRotation)
        Add features in the header section -> should be moved to the header parser class!

      • getHeader

        public String getHeader()
        heuristics to get the header section... -> it is now covered by the CRF segmentation model

      • getHeaderLastHope

        public String getHeaderLastHope()
        We return the first page as header estimation... better than nothing when nothing is not acceptable. -> now covered by the CRF segmentation model

      • getHeaderByIntroduction

        public String getHeaderByIntroduction()
        We try to match the introduction section in a safe way, and consider if minimum requirements are met the blocks before this position as header. -> now covered by the CRF segmentation model

      • getBody

        public String getBody()
        Return the text content of the body of the document. getHeader() and getReferences() must have been called before. -> this should be removed at some point... it is only used now as default solution to determine the language of an article with the language identifier

      • getAllBlocksClean

        public String getAllBlocksClean(int toIgnore1,
                       int toIgnore2)
        Return all blocks without markers.

        Ignore the toIgnore1 th blocks and the blocks after toIgnore2 (included)
